scripts.build-client: cd client && REACT_APP_BUILD_TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s) REACT_APP_BUILD_ID=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) REACT_APP_COMMIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false npm run build && cd .. && ./scripts/prerender-canonicals.sh
scripts.build-client-dev: cd client && REACT_APP_BUILD_TIMESTAMP=$(date +%s) REACT_APP_BUILD_ID=$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S) REACT_APP_COMMIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown') GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=true npm run build && cd .. && ./scripts/prerender-canonicals.sh
scripts.build: npm run install-client && npm run build-client
